body:
Hello, I am a newcomer to temporal, and I have noticed that Cassandra may consume a lot of resources.

I was curious to see if the interface to the database was completed in terms of Workflow persistence at development time to replace Cassandra with another database.

Thank you for answering that question.

comments.body:
Sorry for my question, if anyone else is reading here with the same question, please check this document.

https://docs.temporal.io/docs/server/versions-and-dependencies/#postgresql

title: Is there a way to replace Cassandra with other databases like Redis or PostgresQL
